headline: Assessing Affirm Holdings (AFRM) Valuation After Strong Q2 Results And New Intuit And Expedia Partnerships
summary: Affirm Holdings (AFRM) is back in focus after releasing second quarter results alongside new partnerships with Intuit and Expedia, a combination that highlights both its current profitability and broader reach in buy now, pay later. See our latest analysis for Affirm Holdings. The strong second quarter results and new deals with Intuit, Expedia and Wayfair come at a time when the 30 day share price return is a 34.5% decline and the 1 year total shareholder return is a 37.24% loss, while the 3...
